docs.snippet: At a meeting of the Board of Police Commissioners, yesterday, the following report was received from General-Superintendent KENNEDY, and Ordered on file.

headline.main: THE POLICE COMMISSIONERS.; Quarterly Report of the General Superintendent. PATROL FORCE. PATROLLING IN NEW-YORK. PATROLLING IN BROOKLYN. DETAILED FORCE. DETECTIVE FORCE. HARBOR FORCE. CONDITION OF THE FORCE. DISCIPLINE OF THE FORCE. DISTRICT INSPECTORS. CHANGE OF MEMBERS. ARRESTS. TELEGRAPH. MISCELLANEOUS. SANITARY COMPANY. SPECIAL POLICE.

docs.lead_paragraph: At a meeting of the Board of Police Commissioners, yesterday, the following report was received from General-Superintendent KENNEDY, and Ordered on file.

docs.snippet: Advices to the 17th inst. have been received from Europe by the arrival of the steamship Nova Scotian off Father Point, on her way to Quebec. The news is two days later than by the Vanderbilt. It is stated, on the authority of the Paris corres- ...

docs.snippet: The Institute was called to order at 8  o'clock, and prayer was offered by Rev. Dr. McJILTON, of Baltimore.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Institute was called to order at 8 o'clock, and prayer was offered by Rev. Dr. McJILTON, of Baltimore.

docs.snippet: In the rain and mud the Prince landed, and was received on Saturday at 10 o'clock. Mayor RODIER, dressed most bombastically, welcomed him in an English and French address, to which the Prince, as usual, replied.

headline.main: THE PRINCE OF WALES.; SPLENDID RECEPTION AT MONTREAL. IMPORTANT DAY'S WORK. Openiog of the Crystal Palace Exhibition and Completion of the Victoria Bridge. Reception of the New-York Committee Formal Acceptance of the Invitation to Visit this City. INTERESTING SCENES AND INCIDENTS.PREPARATIONS FOR GRAND BALL.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the rain and mud the Prince landed, and was received on Saturday at 10 o'clock. Mayor RODIER, dressed most bombastically, welcomed him in an English and French address, to which the Prince, as usual, replied.

docs.snippet: The festivities of Saratoga were rather rudely broken in upon Saturday evening. A gentleman, who had been taking his usual afternoon drive, dropped dead as he alighted from his carriage.

headline.main: LIFE AT SARATOGA.; An Unpleasant Visitor Calls Sunday at Saratoga How it was Spent by the Habitues Thurlow Weed and Cornelius Wendell A Young Widow and Her History A Peep Behind the Curtain.

docs.lead_paragraph: The festivities of Saratoga were rather rudely broken in upon Saturday evening. A gentleman, who had been taking his usual afternoon drive, dropped dead as he alighted from his carriage.

docs.snippet: A telegram from Berlin, dated the 13th inst., says: "It is certain that Austria has abandoned the idea  of having the possession of Venetia guaranteed by Germany. Nevertheless, at the interview at Toplitz a perfect understanding was established...

headline.main: THE GERMAN CONFEDERATION.; MEANING OF THE TOPLITZ INTERVIEW. EUROPEAN NEWS. GERMAN UNITY. MONTENEGRO.

docs.lead_paragraph: A telegram from Berlin, dated the 13th inst., says: "It is certain that Austria has abandoned the idea of having the possession of Venetia guaranteed by Germany. Nevertheless, at the interview at Toplitz a perfect understanding was established between Austria and Prussia relative to the basis of the principle of non-intervention in reference to the affairs of Italy."

docs.snippet: The United States Mail steamship Bienville, D. BULLOCK Commander, from New-Orleans the 15th  inst., and Havana at noon of the 18th, arrived at 1:30 P.M. yesterday.

headline.main: FROM HAVANA.; Arrival of the Bienville Health of the City Good Increase of the Coolie Trade.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship Bienville, D. BULLOCK Commander, from New-Orleans the 15th inst., and Havana at noon of the 18th, arrived at 1:30 P.M. yesterday.
